content: a recipe to create a top-down hat while practising several kind of increases the top-down construction allows you to use as much yarn as you have perfect for yarn chicken game lovers the pattern comes in 1 size only but it is a very stretchy hat so it should fit comfortably a head circumference between 54 to 59 cm although yarn quantities might need adjustment you can play with gauge to get smaller or larger sizes instead of knitting a swatch the pattern suggest to measure as-you-knit to estimate if the hat will have the suggested size enjoy
